about_the_game:
This is a biography of Obscure Chronicle of Dynasty's main protagonist, Liao Hao, which was written by the game's producer many years ago. It is proud of me to show you this story, which might provide an initial syllabus for the game.

*This DLC will only provide you some PDF files. You can download these files in the "[game's root catalogue]\DLC\DLC01\" of the game.
*We highly suggest you have basic Ancient Chinese(文言) reading ability for understanding. That is, we believe that machine translation is not fit for this biography.
detailed_description:
This is a biography of Obscure Chronicle of Dynasty's main protagonist, Liao Hao, which was written by the game's producer many years ago. It is proud of me to show you this story, which might provide an initial syllabus for the game.

*This DLC will only provide you some PDF files. You can download these files in the "[game's root catalogue]\DLC\DLC01\" of the game.
*We highly suggest you have basic Ancient Chinese(文言) reading ability for understanding. That is, we believe that machine translation is not fit for this biography.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: ANY System that supports PDF Reader
  • Processor: ANY
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ANY
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Sound Card: NO NEED
